document_data.Powers: Even the vial in which the potion was kept was light and gently glided down back into the hand that tossed it into the air.
document_data.Creation: One of the recipes of this potion called for a sublimate of [[autumncrocus]] plant, combined with a certain [[alchemical]] essence.
